name: smalltalk
description: A small talk program for web application security practice

scripts.postinstall: node -e "require('fs').copyFile('sample.env', '.env', err => err ? (require('consola').error(err), process.exit(1)) : require('consola').ready({ message: 'ready to start the server with \`npm start\`!', badge: true }))"

author: Alan-Liang
